data.title: Cascada, "Miracle"
data.meta_description: I'm not sure if anyone has heard this, but it's been a hit on z103 for a few months now, going back to the end of March, is when I first heard it, and is still hanging on the Top 10 of the weekly Top
data.text:
Post by HER MINAJesty on

I'm not sure if anyone has heard this, but it's been a hit on z103 for a few months now, going back to the end of March, is when I first heard it, and is still hanging on the Top 10 of the weekly Top 40.

It starts off "Boy, meets girl, you are the perfect world" something like that, and the chorus is:

"I need a miracle, I wanna be your girl, give me a chance to see, that you were made for me, I need a miracle, please let me be your girl, one day you'll see, it will happen to me"

It's a pretty good dance track, I like it. Not one of my total favourites, but it's a decent, standard dance song.

Post by HER MINAJesty on

meh...I said it in June and I'll say it now, the song is ok, nothing special, IMO. It's too cookie-cutter, dance/euro for my liking. I remember hearing it all the time at the club in the summer and it's just kind of annoying, it's like one of those songs little 12 year olds who think they are cool like lol what an analogy
